name: Victor Araujo
body:
### About me

Currently studying a master's degree in Pervasive Computing and Communications for Sustainable Development, an Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree taking place in Université de Lorraine (France), Lappeenranta University of Technology (Finland) and Luleå University of Technology (Sweden).

I'm an enthusiast of stuff like travelling, filter coffee, movies with plot twists, philosophy of mind and hiking in volcanoes.

### Contact information
ve.ar91@gmail.com
